questions.title: Merge two sorted arrays
questions.question: Write a C Program to merge the elements of two arrays and to form a single array sorted in ascending order.

questions.title: Longest substring
questions.question: Given a string s, write a C program to find the length of the longest substring without repeating characters. Also, display the substring.

questions.title: Smallest number using pointers
questions.question: Write a program to find the smallest number in a list of integers using pointers

questions.title: String functions using pointers
questions.question:
Implement the following string library functions using pointers:
string length
string copy
string comparison
string concatenation

questions.title: Bubble sort using pointers
questions.question: Implement bubble sort without using array (Use pointers instead)

questions.title: Linear Search
questions.question: Implement Linear Search.

questions.title: Binary Search
questions.question: Implement Binary Search.

questions.title: Stack Using Array
questions.question: Implement Stack using array.

questions.title: String palindrome
questions.question: Write a program in C to check whether a string is palindrome or not, using stack.

questions.title: Infix to Postfix Using Stack
questions.question: Use a stack to convert an infix expression to a postfix expression, then evaluate the result.

questions.title: Infix to Prefix Using Stack
questions.question: Write a program to use a stack to convert an infix expression to a prefix expression.

questions.title: Infix to Postfix without Stack
questions.question: Convert an infix expression to a postfix expression without using a stack.

questions.title: Queue
questions.question: Implement a Queue using arrays with operations to insert, delete, and display.

questions.title: Circular Queue
questions.question: Implement a Circular Queue using arrays with operations to insert, delete, and display.

questions.title: Priority Queue
questions.question: Implement a Priority Queue using arrays with operations to insert, delete, and display.

questions.title: Double Ended Queue
questions.question: Implement a Double Ended Queue using arrays with operations to insert, delete, and display elements at both ends of the queue.

questions.title: Polynomial Addition
questions.question: Write a program to read two polynomials and store them in an array. Calculate the sum of the two polynomials and display the first polynomial, second polynomial and the resultant polynomial.

questions.title: Sparse Matrix
questions.question: Write a program to enter two matrices in normal form. Write a function to convert two matrices to tuple form and display it. Also, find the transpose of the two matrices represented in tuple form and display it. Find the sum of the two matrices in tuple form and display the sum in tuple form.

questions.title: Singly LinkedList
questions.question: Create a menu-driven program to perform operations on a linked list, including display, insertion, deletion, etc.

questions.title: Palindrome Using doubly linked list
questions.question: Create a doubly linked list from a string and efficiently check if the string is a palindrome.

questions.title: Stack using linked list
questions.question: Implement a stack using a linked list with operations like push, pop, and display.

questions.title: Queue using linked list
questions.question: Implement a queue using a linked list with operations like enqueue, dequeue, and display.

questions.title: Queue Reversal using stack
questions.question: Write a program to reverse the contents of a queue using a stack.

questions.title: Polynomial Addition Using Linked List
questions.question: Read two polynomials, store them in a linked list, calculate their sum, and display the input and resultant polynomials.

questions.title: Polynomial Multiplication Using Linked List
questions.question: Read two polynomials, store them in a linked list, calculate their product, and display the input and resultant polynomials.

questions.title: Two Variable Polynomial Addition
questions.question: Add two polynomials with two variables, stored in a linked list, based on powers of the first and then the second variable.

questions.title: Student Record Management
questions.question: Create a linked list to store student records (number, name, total mark), and provide functions for insertion, deletion, searching, sorting, and display.

questions.title: binary tree
questions.question:
Create a binary tree with the following operations:
1. Insert a new node
2. Inorder traversal
3. Preorder traversal
4. Postorder traversal
5. Delete a node

questions.title: Binary search tree
questions.question:
Write a program to create a binary search tree (data items are integers) with the following operations:
1. Insert a new node
2. Inorder traversal
3. Preorder traversal
4. Postorder traversal
5. Delete a node
6. Find the number of leaf nodes
7. Sort the input numbers
